mapper.update: update tag set deleted = 0 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.id, t.name, count(at.tag_id) as count from tag as t left join article_tag as at on t.id = at.tag_id where t.deleted = 0 group by t.id, t.name order by count desc limit #{limit}
